<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grovel](/Feats.aspx?ID=5619) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=590" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=759" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You convince your foe you're less of a threat. You attempt to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=2390) against a creature. Unlike a normal Feint, the creature can be within 30 feet instead of in your melee reach, and you make your check against its Will DC instead of its Perception DC.
